name: DevHub
description: A modern developer portfolio and project showcase platform built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS. Features authentication, analytics, and custom themes.

name: CodeCollab
description: Real-time collaborative code editor with video chat and whiteboard. Perfect for pair programming and technical interviews.

name: API Guardian
description: Open-source API rate limiting and security middleware for Node.js applications. Supports Redis, JWT, and custom rules.

name: LearnPath
description: Personalized learning path generator using AI. Get customized roadmaps for any tech skill with curated resources and milestones.

name: EventHub
description: Community event management platform with RSVP, ticketing, and live streaming integration. Used by 50+ tech communities.

name: CLI Toolkit
description: Collection of developer productivity CLI tools for project scaffolding, git workflows, and automation. 10k+ weekly downloads.
